title: Tax Preparers Gear Up For Complex Affordable Care Act Rules
teaser: Under the Affordable Care Act, there are new forms, along with new questions for people who have - and don't have - health insurance.
contentencoded:
The taxman cometh, and tax preparers are anxiously getting ready to deal with new rules that have kicked in because of the Affordable Care Act.

Under the Affordable Care Act, there are new forms, along with new questions for people who have – and don’t have – health insurance.

Elana Gordon of WHYY’s “The Pulse,”  a member of the Here & Now Contributors Network,  reports.

  • Click here to see Gordon’s full report. 

Reporter

  • Elana Gordon, reporter for WHYY’s “The Pulse.” She tweets @Elana_Gordon.
